about_the_game:
Explore the first stage, Elysera's Valley, as well as 5 unique characters, including the newest addition to the roster, Qingwa! Unlock and choose a wide selection of special upgrades to fit your perfect build.

The full release will include more stages, more bosses, more characters to choose from, as well as more constellations, character upgrades and potions!

OLAPU is a co-op action roguelite which you can play alone or together with a party of up to four people. Your goal is to survive the incoming enemy waves becoming more and more brutal as time goes on. If you manage to survive these waves you have proven yourself to be worthy of fighting the most powerful beings in this realm. These boss fights heavily resemble mechanics of raids in MMORPGs.

Before you start your adventure, choose the class that best represents you, support or damage dealer, ranged or melee. Each character has their own unique attacks and special abilities, allowing for a wide variety of play styles and opportunities for many different combinations of builds.

To stand any chance of surviving you must gear up, enemies will drop stars that you need to collect to level you and your fellow allies up. Stars can be exchanged for a piece of a constellation, which in turn can do simple things from increasing your base stats, to unlocking powerful summons to help you in your fight and everything in between.

Additionally, playing any given character levels them up based on your performance. Every fifth level, you’ll unlock a unique upgrade exclusive to that character, which will drastically aid you in future runs!

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 4-Core Processor
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2gb of VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: OLAPU is an action roguelite in which you survive an onslaught of cute creatures on the path to defeating the most powerful beings in the realm. To stand any chance of surviving you must gather stars and complete your constellations. Recover the realm alone or in up to 4 player online co-op!
